title: Jax
body: Literally some deadly disease at the moment.  I'm not going to write an entire shitpost in him, discuss?

replies.body: Malphite is a great counter against jax even jng vs jng jax wont be able to handle malphite due to his pasive, cc, and nearly almost all of his abilities being "non-aa" type skills.  Just go tank bro
Just play Reknekton into him he cant do shiat in lane then falls off hard with no farm.

even if you shut him out in lane if he gets a couple kills during transition he can be a rampant pain in the ass especially if he has rageblade. the only real way to deal with him is to kill him asap have your ap mid burst him to zero as some jax's like to leap in to get a stun off because the longer the fight goes on with him still alive, the more chances he will penta your entire team.
I'm talking Blind Pick. But in ranked, I guess that could be a solution
